capsules_submitted.utterance: I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's truly "the boy who lived" - I mean, can you imagine being famous for surviving a killing curse as a baby? It's just incredible. The way J.K. Rowling wove his tale into the wizarding world is just masterful.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's magic wand is definitely one of his most notable possessions. I mean, it's hard to imagine him without it, you know? It's like an extension of himself and a symbol of his power as a wizard.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He did indeed have a magic wand that was very special to him.
